page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: The children at our school have a variety of hobbies and so do the parents. These range from sport, gardening, reading, DIY, home brewing to sleeping as was stated by one person. A lot of people use a near by park in their time. There are some facilities at Cofton park for all the family. A lot of people go there just to walk, they may also take their dogs. Both exercising and training of dogs takes place as well as a lot of fun for the dogs. There are facilities for football cricket and other ball games for the enegetic members of the family. For the children there is a play area with swings and a slide and an assault course. The more adventurous may be seen body popping. Some children use this area to learn to ride their bike in saftey. Others may be learning to fly kites in the open areas.
